description: The defendant was pulled over for driving erratically and was found to have a blood alcohol level above the legal limit.
A witness reported seeing the defendant swerving on the road and almost causing an accident.
The defendant failed a sobriety test and was subsequently arrested for driving under the influence.
The defendant had a strong smell of alcohol on their breath and slurred speech when speaking to the arresting officer.
The defendant was caught on video running a red light and almost hitting another vehicle.
The defendant's blood alcohol level was twice the legal limit at the time of the arrest.
The defendant was found passed out behind the wheel of their car at a red light.
The defendant had an open container of alcohol in the car at the time of the arrest.
The defendant admitted to drinking multiple alcoholic beverages before getting behind the wheel of their car.
The defendant was seen stumbling and having difficulty maintaining their balance before getting into the car.
The defendant was driving on the wrong side of the road and almost caused a head-on collision.
The defendant was seen driving at an excessive speed and almost lost control of their vehicle.
The defendant had bloodshot and watery eyes at the time of the arrest.
The defendant failed to stop at a stop sign and almost caused an accident with another vehicle.
The defendant was driving on a suspended license at the time of the arrest.
The defendant caused a multi-car accident while driving under the influence and injuring several people.
The defendant was caught driving under the influence for the third time and is facing felony charges.
The defendant was found asleep in their car with the engine running and was charged with DUI.
The defendant refused a breathalyzer test and was subsequently charged with DUI.
The defendant was speeding and weaving between lanes while driving under the influence.
The defendant caused property damage while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and property damage.
The defendant hit a pedestrian while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and vehicular manslaughter.
The defendant was driving under the influence with a child in the car and was charged with DUI and child endangerment.
The defendant was involved in a hit-and-run accident while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and hit-and-run.
The defendant was arrested for DUI after driving the wrong way on a one-way street and nearly causing a head-on collision.
The defendant caused a serious injury to another driver while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and causing injury.
The defendant was arrested for DUI after crashing into a police car that was pulled over on the side of the road.
The defendant was caught driving under the influence while on probation for a previous DUI conviction.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being pulled over for driving too slowly and erratically.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a single-car accident and was found to have a blood alcohol level above the legal limit.
The defendant caused a fire while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and reckless endangerment.
The defendant was caught driving under the influence with an open container of alcohol and was charged with DUI and open container violation.
The defendant crashed into a parked car while driving under the influence and was charged with DUI and property damage.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a high-speed chase with the police.
The defendant was charged with DUI after causing a collision with a commercial truck and injuring the driver.
The defendant was charged with DUI after driving into a building and causing property damage.
The defendant was arrested for DUI after falling asleep at a stop sign and blocking traffic.
The defendant was charged with DUI after causing a rollover accident on the highway.
The defendant was charged with DUI after driving the wrong way on a highway and causing a head-on collision.
The defendant was arrested for DUI after being involved in a road rage incident and causing a collision with another vehicle.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being pulled over for swerving and crossing over the center line multiple times.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a hit-and-run accident with a bicyclist.
The defendant was charged with DUI after causing a collision with a pedestrian and fleeing the scene.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a single-car accident and driving off the road into a ditch.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a collision with a police car and injuring the officer.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a collision with a school bus and endangering the lives of several children.
The defendant was arrested for DUI after being found passed out behind the wheel of their car in the middle of the street.
The defendant was charged with DUI after causing a collision with a motorcyclist and causing serious injury.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being involved in a collision with a semi-truck and causing a massive traffic jam.
The defendant was charged with DUI after driving on the sidewalk and causing property damage.
The defendant was charged with DUI after causing a collision with a train and endangering the lives of passengers.
The defendant was charged with DUI after being pulled over for driving with their headlights off at night.
